headline: Will Strong Q2 and Resilient UGG and HOKA Demand Change Deckers Outdoor's (DECK) Narrative
summary: In its recently reported Q2 fiscal 2026 results, Deckers Outdoor delivered higher-than-expected net sales growth of 9.1% year over year, driven by resilient demand for its UGG and HOKA brands and supported by profitability gains despite tariff pressures and increased competition. An interesting takeaway is that, even as management flagged softer projections and tariff impacts ahead, analysts largely maintained a Moderate Buy consensus, underscoring continued confidence in Deckers’ brand...
